page.title: 16INTERVIEWS
page.content: On Tuesday 2nd July we went to Kensworth in relation to map 04 to interview some residents one being Mr Fox and his family. Although they live in Bury Farm Mr Fox isn't a farmer therefore a local farmer farms the land. Mr Fox and his family have lived in this area for three years and enjoy living here for two reasons one they like the rural area and two it is only three quarters of an hour from London where Mr Fox works. Mr Fox chose to live in Kensworth because he was brought up in the countryside and does not which to live it.
